moa.options

Interface Option

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MOAObject, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractClassOption, AbstractOption, ClassOption, ClassOptionWithNames, FileOption, FlagOption, FloatOption, IntOption, ListOption, MultiChoiceOption, StringOption, WEKAClassOption

    public interface Option
extends MOAObject
    Interface representing an option or parameter.
    Version:
    $Revision: 7 $
    Author:
    Richard Kirkby (rkirkby@cs.waikato.ac.nz)
